activities: Live Gamer is an e-commerce solution provider for online games, virtual worlds, social networks, digital entertainment providers, and other interactive media products. We use personal information that we collect to process transactions or requests; to provide services; to provide information on services requested from time-to-time; to inform customers about other information, events, promotions, products, or services; to learn more about and improve the Services; and for the purpose for which information was provided. We collect various types of personal information including personally identifiable information such as name, age, date of birth, address, telephone number, mobile number, e-mail address, purchase details, and payment method details. We may also collect information concerning the type of Internet browser or computer operating system, the domain name of the Internet service provider, and Internet protocol addressing and traffic information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
